pages.text: As your travels continue you just might find that 36 items just isn't enough ... especially if you spend much time mining.

Satchels can carry up to 9 items and can be configured to automatically stash certain items as you pick them up.$(br2)The satchel can be upgraded several times, gaining an additional capacity of 9 with each upgrade.

pages.title: Dyeing
pages.text: Satchels have an additional feature ... the ability to dye them whatever colour you like.  Two colours, actually.$(br2)All you need to do is place your satchel in a crafting table with a dye both above and below it.
